name: Underwater Cave
Description: A partially explored cavern stands by the oceanside. Adventurers reported creepy sounds coming from the inside.

theScene: As you trek through the beach, the sand gets gradually replaced with a more rocky terrain. Eventually you spot a small cavern up ahead, located on a rocky cliff.

Its entrance faces upwards at an angle, and seawater occasionally splashes inside when brought by waves. You suspect the cavern must get flooded completely when the tide rises. Faint sounds can be heard from the inside, a quiet gurgling sound and occasional splashes.
Deciding not to enter the cavern, you climb over the rocky cliff and keep walking until it disappears from view. Oddly enough, there wasn't anyone around.
After taking a short breather you continue to explore the sandy beach.
Descending into the cavern you find yourself stepping on wet, rocky steps. They seem to form a natural staircase, making the descent easier.
As you proceed deeper, the bright sunlight slowly disappears, giving place to opressive darkness. The cave is damp, narrow and it gets increasingly difficult to breathe.

Soon enough your descent is halted as you arrive at the bottom. The cavern continues further in at a more comfortable angle. It never gets too dark as you keep going, due to occasional sun ray breaking into the cavern through narrow cracks in the ceiling.
Eventually you arrive at a fork. The main path descends lower again, and is completely flooded, preventing you from following it.

The side path is located on the wall near the ceiling, and leads slightly upwards. Climbing inside, you find yourself crouching in front of a narrow passage. For a moment you wonder if you should just give up and turn back but decide to see this through.
The passage is short, and after a few turns you arrive in a spacious room. The room is better lit than the rest of the cave, thanks to a large hole in the ceiling at the room's corner.
Most of the room is dominated by a large underground lake. Approaching it, you notice something floating inside...
A body... There is a body floating in the lake!
Pale skin... and long, dark hair splayed over the water's surface... Floating face down, the figure appears completely lifeless.
In that case, you should deliver their body back to the town. They deserve a proper burial at least, and their family needs to know...
This is what a Hero should do after all.
Resolving yourself to the grim task you gulp down and carefully enter the lake. It's not very deep, but the water's biting chill sends a shiver up your bones.

Carefully, slowly you take each step to make sure the lake's depth does not change suddenly. Thankfully the change is slow with no pitfalls. Soon enough you are chest-deep in water. The cold is becoming almost unbearable, but you force yourself to keep a proper pace.
Finally you make it to your grim destination. On a closer inspection the body appears to be female, and completely naked.
You gently tap on her shoulder and turn her body over. Most of her face is concealed by the long hair. Putting your arm under her, you raise her torso from the water. She is cold to touch...
The body shifts, her head turning to face you, a crooked smile forming on her lips as she speaks!
You panic, pushing away the 'corpse' and try to get away. However, numerous tentacles shoot out of the water, preventing your escape!
Mercilessly they grab you, restraining your limbs and forcing you back to face the floating thing.
As you flail and struggle fruitlessly, the pale figure closes in, her thin arms reaching out, grasping, clawing...
Her hands rest on your chest, her long fingers tracing your exposed pecs gently and almost... apologetic?
When you take a closer look at her she doesn't look as terrifying as you thought at first, and her flushed face is anything but corpse-like.
She speaks in a small voice, very slowly. You'd have trouble hearing her if she wasn't so close.
She gets closer, her nude body almost pressing against yours. Her hands still caress you subtly, as if trying to soothe you.
There... there... It's okay, I am not scary... am I..?
You flail and struggle fruitlessly in the grasp of tentacles, sending the cold water splashing everywhere.
The pale woman recoils back, waiting patiently for your outburst to die down...
After another moment you finally manage to calm yourself, but the firm grasp of tentacles on your limbs keeps you uneasy.
The pale woman draws closer again. Taking a closer look at her, she doesn't look as terrifying as you thought at first. Her flushed face is anything but corpse-like.
Fufu... I am sorry... for startling... you...
She speaks in a small voice, very slowly. You'd have trouble hearing her if she wasn't so close.
With the adrenaline rush after the initial shock gone, you start feeling cold again. Very cold in fact, as you find your teeth chattering and body shivering.
...Oh no... You are cold. Here, grab on me...

The tentacles push you unto her before receding and letting you go. You wrap your arms around her neck for support, as remaining upright otherwise is difficult in this cold. She hugs back, holding you close.
You feel a sudden jerk as the woman moves, easily speeding through the water and arriving at the shore in a single push.
Still holding you she slowly moves over the ground for a while before putting you down in the sunlit portion of the room.
Now that you're out of water, it is obvious the tentacles belong to her. This pale woman is obviously some kind of aquatic monster.
After putting you down she retreats some distance away and sits down neatly, looking at you quietly.
Feeling a little better but still shivering you only manage a shaky nod in response.
She gives a tiny smile in response and waits patiently as some time passes before you warm up enough to speak...
I am... Messina. A sea Scylla...
Nice to meet you, Messina... I am {ThePlayerName}.
Another moment passes in awkward silence. Or it is only awkward for you, as the Scylla seems content to remain silent as she looks over you.
So umm... What were you doing in there?
I was... sleeping... Why did you... try to... pick me up..?
Uhh... Sorry. I saw you and thought someone had drowned, and...
Oh... I understand. I should be... more careful, not to confuse people...
She looks away and her face gets red again...
Umm... you seem pretty flushed, are you okay?
She blushes even harder and covers her face with her hands.
I am... naked in front of a man... It is embarrassing, so...
A- ah, s- sorry. I am okay now so you don't have to-
She nods and slithers back to the lake, slipping soundlessly into the water, completely disappearing under its surface.
Deciding it might be time to leave, you get up and walk up to the lake.
So umm... I'll be going now.
She pops her head out of water.
You nod and bid farewell to the quiet Scylla. On your way out of lake room, you still feel a little awkward over the entire interaction. At least there weren't any corpses.
Deciding to meet Messina again you navigate through familiar caverns and quickly arrive at her underground lake.
She is sitting on the rocks by the lake, her numerous tentacles folded neatly around her. She notices your presence and gives you a small smile.
I was... hoping you'd visit... so...
She trails off and goes quiet.
Thank you... I bought... a new one for...
She trails off and goes quiet.
Ah- umm, sorry... I didn't mean to speak... so loudly.
That's okay... What did you want to say?
Are you... a hero? An adventurer?
You nod in response and she claps her hands together happily.
She pulls out a potion from behind a rock and hands it to you.
Nooo... My massage will help you relax, make you stronger... A hero should be strong, right..?
But if you get... aroused... I can- ah... help too...
Um... so, do you want a... massage?
She looks a little disappointed, her shoulders slumping.
Messina leads you to a large, smooth boulder. It is pretty round, so you imagine lying down on it might be a little awkward.
Sorry... There is no better place here...
Umm... Lie on your stomach, please.
You do as instructed and lie down, glad to discover that the rock isn't as chilly as you could expect.
The hands that rest on your back, however, are rather cold, having made you yelp in surprise. She removes her hands in a hurry.

EventText.NameOfScene: What are you doing in this cave?
theScene: Umm... I am on a vacation...
Wouldn't it be more fun on the beach?
Noo... I am no good around many people... Or with heat...
But... Scyllas like swimming... So it isn't that strange, right?
So when I found you... naked... what were you doing?
No... I woke up when you entered water.
Hehe... I wanted to spook you... Hehehe...
She giggles some more when she sees your expression, then covers her mouth and looks away for a moment.
Umm, I am sorry... I often hear that my sense of humor is... unsavory.
Because... I am on a vacation...
I want to take it easy... And...
I was not allowed on the resort... unless I promised to be nice.
I am too strong for... new heroes who may come here...
Yes... Oh, I guess it is a permanent one now? Umm...
I was fired from my workplace... So I came here to unwind and... and uhh, nevermind.
Sorry to hear that... Why were you fired?
I was a masseuse at a parlor in the capital... But I am not very good with clients... Or sometimes I am too good...
I am a bit shy... so some clients were unhappy. Others liked my massages so much that they started to send gifts... One man even begged in public to marry him...

I made all sorts of trouble really... One elf liked my 'happy endings' too much... so she kept coming in every day and got in debt to pay for it... Her family filed a complaint and the parlor went under investigation for illegal hypnosis extortion practices...
Uuuh... There was no hypnosis of course... But it still troubled my boss a lot.
Then there was this one bunny girl... She got very horny every session and kept extending service time... I had to work overtime whenever she came by...
Ahh... I sound like a prostitute don't I? But I really just wanted to give people massages...
...I am not sure I understand. Some trouble aside, it sounds like you made a lot of money for your boss. Why would that get you fired?
Ahh... Well, my boss is a very laid back person... She couldn't handle all the excitement... So at some point she begged me to retire... and I accepted.
She looks away then nods, slowly.
I think so... I was thinking of opening my own parlor...
But that sounds so scary... Managing a business all by myself... I don't have enough confidence...
Ah, umm... sorry for talking your ear off... Let's change the subject.
Yes... I am not very confident... at anything... except massages...
We could try doing some confidence-building exercises, or practice things you're not good at.
Okay... Then... You'll be a customer, and I am the receptionist.
Messina assumes position next to a boulder, using it as a makeshift desk, and looks at you expectedly.
Greetings..! W-welcome to Messina's Pampering Tentacles Spa...
I would like to order a massage. It is my first time here, could you tell me more about your services?
Certainly... We specialize in tentacle massages... For your first time I recommend the Common Course with a Scylla...
Ah..! But you are free to choose any masseuse, of course... We have slimes, succubi, lamia and many others...
The Common Course involves a full-body relaxation massage via hands and tentacles... You may request usage of oils and lotions separately...
As she talks her tentacles fold into numbers. You assume it is supposed to indicate service pricing.
900 eros per massage? She's giving you some nice freebies.
Next, our parlor has an assisted bathing course... Be aware that our slime masseuse does not offer that service...
We also have a... prostate massage specialist... Any other erotic services are negotiated separately with the masseuse...
So, would you like to make a reservation?
Yes, I would like to request...
You finish your little reservation roleplay but Messina doesn't look convinced.
That was pretty difficult... But I don't think it was very helpful... You were a very polite customer.
If being polite is not challenging enough, maybe a sleazy, lewd customer would work?
Hey there, lady, I was hoping I could book a massage session... But a man has needs you understand...
So I was hoping for something special with a shapely pretty lady such as yourself... Maybe a passionate steamy encounter for a couple of hours, if you get what I mean...
Of course sir, say no more... I understand completely and know exactly what you need.
She smiles and motions a handjob discreetly with her hands.
A Succubus Special is just what you need sir. She has two time slots available tonight, I assume you would like to reserve both...?
We get many customers like that... Especially the elves... So I am used to it.
A rude customer must definitely work.
Squid ti-! Umm, yes sir, would you like a-
Yeah I'm looking for some quick fuck and maybe a massage, how much are you gonna charge me?
Umm sir... we are a massage parlor..! Any erotic se-
Huuh, are you messing with me?! I could find a girl for half that much!-
T-time out! S-sorry {ThePlayerName}, I can't do this...
N-no, it's okay... I should be able to deal with that too...
Ahh, I suppose someone like that... could be denied service...
Umm anyway... I kept you long enough, you should probably be going for today...
See you next time then. We should try something different then.
Yes... I am looking forward to it...
She slithers into the lake and turns to wave at you.
You nod and she disappears under the dark water's surface.
Now what would be good for next time..?
Today we should go outside the cave and have you talk with strangers on the beach.
Ehh..? T-that's too much... I could never...
You'll never improve if you shy away from a challenge!
It's okay, I'll be there with you and will chime in if something goes wrong.
You take Messina's hand in your own and lead her out of the cave.
She squints from the sunlight at first but seems to adapt fairly quickly.
Looking around for a person to talk to she seems oddly invigorated. Suddenly she raises her arm and points in the direction behind you.
I just have to... speak to someone, right..? How about... her..?
Looking in the direction she's pointing you spot a lone Nereid standing and looking at the ocean.
Umm... What should I... talk about?
Anything you want. Try making some small talk at first, then see how it goes.
Okay... I will do my best...
She slithers in the direction of Nereid and you follow closely right behind her. Some distance away the Nereid notices your approach and turns to face you.
Hey. On a date with your boyfriend? Lucky.
H-he's my... my coach... N-not boyfriend...
Huh. Okay. Did you need something?
The Nereid turns to face the ocean again and smiles.
The waters are calm. I am calm today, too.
Messina is fidgeting quietly as the Nereid watches the waves absent-mindedly, both are not saying anything.
Just as you're about to say something to help, Messina speaks up.
Umm... Miss Nereid, would you like a... massage?
Eh? Is this a threesome invitation?
Nooo... Just a normal... massage, if you'd like...
The Nereid shrugs and plops flat on the ground, right where she was standing.
Messina kneels next to her, moving the Nereid's incredibly long hair aside, revealing the fish girl's glistening back muscles, thick tail and her firm butt.
After moving some distance away to give them some space you sit down. You overhear them talking quietly as Messina works, so this might work as casual conversation practice after all.

Some time passes as you ward off boredom by looking at the ocean waves. Suddenly you notice the Nereid getting a little restless, her tail waving around and sending sand flying around. Curious, you move in closer for a better look.

Messina's numerous tentacles are diligently working on Nereid's inner thighs. The slick appendages occasionaly flicking against her crotch are obviously making the Nereid horny, but Messina seems oblivious to the effects her massage is having on the Nereid as she keeps going, a happy smile plastered on her face.
You- you are really good with those... Oohh...â™¥
Thank you... I am glad you're enjoying it...
Yes I- Oh shit I'm actually gonna... gonna cuuuum! Aaah!â™¥
The Nereid cums hard, her back arching as her quivering pussy squirts clear juice all over the sand and Messina's tentacles.
Shaking with pleasure, the Nereid is left completely helpless as she starts to magically fade away.
Fucking incredible... I should try it with girls more often...

Messina was victorious!
Messina gained 30 Exp and 108 Eros.
W-what? W-w-whyy?! I- I didn't mean to... Auuu...

Messina seems too embarrassed to continue training today, so you lead her back to cave and bid your farewells at the entrance. She slithers inside, sulking and still embarrassed.
Good enough for one day.

EventText.NameOfScene: We should change out training regimen.
theScene: What did you... have in mind..?
Ah, umm... sex fighting? Like adventurers do?

You nod in response and Messina blushes furiously.
She remains quiet for a while then finally speaks up, in a particularly tiny voice.
I think it will. A sex fighter is proactive and has to act confidently to get what they want. I think it will be helpful to you too.
...You just want to do naughty things with me.
Err.. well, yes... But I really think it'll help!
I promised the lifeguard... that I wouldn't bully any adventurers while I am here. So first, go and ask her... for permission...
Ah... good... What did she say..?
Ah, umm... okay... That is... good.
Then... Let's fight... But there is a bit of trouble, I think...
What happens if I lose...? I will just teleport back home, right..?
I think so, that's what usually happens.
I live all that way back in capital... I don't want to go home yet, so...
Umm... so if I start losing I will give up... then you stop and let me rest...? Would that work?
Having triumphed in battle you disentangle yourself from Messina, who is left shaking on the verge of a powerful orgasm.
Umm... the hero needs a reward now!
She slithers towards the lake and pulls out a dark bag from the water.
From the bag she procurs a small sack of eros and hands it to you. It is a little wet but you shrug and accept.
Thanks for helping me again... I think this is... helpful.
I really want to take a nap now... So you should go and... finish your adventure...
You nod and wave a goodbye to the timid Scylla, feeling a little exhausted from your fight but ready to continue your adventure.
Yes... I was about to ask... myself...
She nods and looks at you quietly.
Messina leads you to the same large, smooth boulder and gestures you to lie down.
As you get comfortable on the rock, you notice Messina warming her hands with quiet breaths.
She soon places her hands on your back, the familiar sensation of her long fingers caressing your body draining tension from your muscles before she even starts the massage.
Humming a little song under her breath she increases the force behind her movements, expertly massaging out the tension and stress from your adventures out of your body.
As her hands work your upper back and neck, you feel her, slimy tentacles begin to massage your legs...
Thanks for visiting me again... You should go and... finish your adventure now...
Thank you for your help again.
You nod and wave a goodbye to the timid Scylla, feeling energized and ready to finish your adventure.
She gives you a little wave and slips into the dark lake quietly.
Quickly moving backwards through the now familiar cave you reach the entrance and get back onto the beach, happy to see sunlight again.
